# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet all your needs and expectations, and I believe it's worth every penny of its $80 value to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $75. This is a great opportunity to get a high-value item at a reasonable cost. I hope you'll find this offer irresistible and decide to make the purchase. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
